  • Leadership & Service

    • MIT Master in City Planning Committee

      Cambridge, MA

      Nominated and confirmed as a student advisor to the MCP Committee, which oversees rules and regulations of the MCP degree while considering the academic and social welfare of students

    • MIT Development Lab (D-Lab)

      Cambridge, MA & Oyugis, Kenya

      Planned and organized all travel logistics for 9 undergraduate & graduate students in conjunction with MIT’s Gender & Development class
      Liaised with partner organization staff in Kenya to ensure successful participation of local staff and key community members; assisted in navigating cross-cultural barriers between local staff & MIT students
      Participated in a multi-day workshop designed to understand socio-economic and cultural challenges facing teenage parents in rural Homa Bay County, Kenya

      Washington, D.C.

      Attended regular meetings to discuss the experiences of young professionals working at USAID, with a specific emphasis on equity across varying entry-level federal hiring mechanisms
